parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the binding. The description must be 1 to 128 characters in length. By default, no description is applied.

parameters.name: OSSBucket
parameters.description: The name of the OSS bucket in the same region as the project.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. For information about how to create a project, see [CreateProject](~~478153~~).
